Hi, my name is

John Lim

I build things for the web.

Passionate web designer with a keen eye for aesthetics and a commitment to delivering engaging user experiences. Expert in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, with proficiency in Figma, Webflow, Jekyll, Github, Photoshop, and other relevant tools. Dedicated to creating visually stunning and functional websites that exceed client expectations and drive business success.

Resume

01. About me

Hello, my name is John and I enjoy creating beautiful and functional websites.
I also have experience running my own online business where I print and sell customized products.

This experience has given me a unique perspective on web design and e-commerce, and I am always looking for ways to improve the user experience and drive sales.

I am constantly learning and staying up to date with the latest trends and technologies in web design.

I believe that communication and collaboration are key to a successful project, and I am always open to feedback and suggestions.
